row.Docu:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.ACTION.COPY = General description = Copies a file or a directory. Support relative, UNC or absolute path in both target and source path. Wildcard support (*,?) could be effective on both filename and directory name of source only. Overwrite option should be set to YES in case file/directory is existed, unless action will be failed and no file/directory is copied. Support exclude file or directory by exact name or wildcard.
= Inputs = Source directory/file name: name of source directory or file to move Target directory/file name: name of target directory or file Overwrite existing: overwrite if target file(s) is exist Exclude: exclude file or directory, can use wildcard here
= Behavior = Copy file/directory or rename file
= Outputs = (none)
= Return Value = 0 - File(s)/Directory(s) was copied successfully Other - Invalid data or action has been failed
= Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none)
= Example = Source directory structure: C:\src C:\src\test.txt C:\src\testfolder\test.txt C:\src\testfolder\abc.txt C:\dst C:\dst\dst_test.txt
1. Copy file to file 1.1 Target file is already existed Source directory/file name: C:\src\test.txt Target directory/file name: C:\dst\dst_test.txt Overwrite existing: YES
Copies content of source file to target file Output: C:\dst C:\dst\dst_test.txt
1.2 Target file have not existed yet Source directory/file name: C:\src\test.txt Target directory/file name: C:\dst\dst\dst.txt Overwrite existing: YES/NO
Copies content of source file to target file Output: C:\dst C:\dst\dst_test.txt C:\dst\dst C:\dst\dst\dst.txt
2. Copy directory to directory Source directory/file name: C:\src Target directory/file name: C:\dst Overwrite existing: YES
Copies recursive all sub items in "C:\src" to target directory Output: C:\dst C:\dst\dst_test.txt C:\dst\test.txt C:\dst\testfolder\test.txt C:\dst\testfolder\abc.txt
3. Copy with wildcard Wildcard is supported in source directory/file only
3.1 Filter all content Source directory/file name: C:\src\* Target directory/file name: C:\dst Overwrite existing: YES
Copies recursive all sub items in "C:\src" to target directory Output: C:\dst C:\dst\dst_test.txt C:\dst\test.txt C:\dst\testfolder\test.txt C:\dst\testfolder\abc.txt
3.2 Filter specific files Source directory/file name: C:\src\test* Target directory/file name: C:\dst Overwrite existing: YES
Copies recursive all sub items in "C:\src" to target directory Output: C:\dst C:\dst\dst_test.txt C:\dst\test.txt C:\dst\testfolder\test.txt
